name: nids-system
description: Network Intrusion Detection System with ML-based threat detection

scripts.setup: cd backend && python -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.setup:windows: cd backend && python -m venv venv && call venv\Scripts\activate.bat && pip install -r requirements.txt && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.backend: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && python run.py
scripts.test: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && python -m pytest && cd ../frontend && npm test
scripts.clean: rm -rf backend/venv backend/__pycache__ backend/models/* frontend/node_modules frontend/build
scripts.clean:windows: rmdir /s /q backend\venv backend\__pycache__ frontend\node_modules frontend\build 2>nul || echo Cleaned

author: NIDS Development Team
